shown below.

requests to CMS! No paper, fax, or email needed! This allows the public
to submit requests quickly and electronically directly into our requests
database.

Beneficiary Claims Portal* * - *This portal
allows third party requestors and beneficiaries to submit FOIA/Privacy
requests for Medicare beneficiary claim records. *Please be prepared to
upload the required Medicare HIPAA authorization form and any other
supporting documents required for third party requests to the portal.*
For more information, access our CMS FOIA Service Center
.
